action.action-desc: Ms. Plaskett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to authorize the basic allowance for housing for members of the uniformed services in the Virgin Islands.

section.header: Application of basic allowance for housing to members of the uniformed services in the Virgin Islands

subsection.text: Section 403(b) of title 37, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the heading, by inserting and the Virgin Islands after the United States;
in paragraph (1), by inserting and the Virgin Islands after the United States; and
in paragraphs (2), (3)(A), and (6), by inserting or the Virgin Islands after the United States each place it appears.

subsection.text: Section 403(c) of title 37, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the heading, by inserting or the Virgin Islands after the United States; and
in paragraphs (1), (2), (3)(A)(i), and (3)(B), by inserting or the Virgin Islands after the United States each place it appears.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall take effect on the date of the enactment of this Act and shall apply to payments under section 403 of title 37, United States Code, beginning on January 1, 2024.
